title: Celo, Shopping for Blockchain Partner, Turns to the Delicate Issue of Money
description: A standalone blockchain, Celo is looking to migrate to become a layer-2 network atop Ethereum. The months-long selection process has started to look like "The Bachelorette," with teams behind the Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon and zkSync networks all vying to win the technology mandate.

title: Dogecoin Developer Deploys Classic First-Person Shooter ‘Doom’ on DOGE Network – Here’s How
description:
A Dogecoin (DOGE) developer is powering an old school first-person shooter on the memecoin’s network using “doginals” – the dog-themed asset’s version of Bitcoin (BTC) ordinals. In a new thread, developer Mini Doge says he’s deployed Doom, a ’90s game that pits players against demons on Mars, using doginals. Doginals permanently inscribe information on small […]

The post Dogecoin Developer Deploys Classic First-Person Shooter ‘Doom’ on DOGE Network – Here’s How appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
